panels.content:
- 除了 IO 指标是所有容器的总和
- 其他指标都是所有容器的均值

- 除了 IO 指标是所有容器的总和

panels.title: Notes

targets.expr: avg by(mobiu_service) (tomcat_threads_busy{namespace="$cluster", mobiu_service="$service_name"})or avg by(service_name) (tomcat_threads_busy_threads{namespace="$cluster", mobiu_service="$service_name"})

sum by(namespace, mobiu_service)(delta(jvm_classes_loaded{namespace="$cluster", mobiu_service="$service_name",}[5m])) or sum by(namespace, mobiu_service)(delta(jvm_classes_loaded_classes{namespace="$cluster", mobiu_service="$service_name",}[5m]))
